code: export function formatPrice(price){return price.toLocaleString('en-US',{style:'currency',currency:'USD'});}export var foodItems=[{name:"Cheese Pizza",img:"/img/pizza.png",section:"Pizza",price:1},{name:"Pepperoni Pizza",img:"/img/pizza2.jpeg",section:"Pizza",price:1.5},{name:"Chicken Pizza",img:"/img/chicken-pizza.jpeg",section:"Pizza",price:2},{name:"Veggie Pizza",img:"/img/healthy-pizza.jpeg",section:"Pizza",price:2},{name:"Burger",img:"/img/burger.jpeg",section:"Sandwich",price:3},{name:"Gyro",img:"/img/gyro.jpeg",section:"Sandwich",price:4},{name:"Shrimp PoBoy",img:"/img/sandwich.jpeg",section:"Sandwich",price:4},{name:"Melt",img:"/img/melt.jpeg",section:"Sandwich",price:4},{name:"Fries",img:"/img/fries.jpeg",section:"Sides",price:2},{name:"Garlic Sauce",img:"/img/garlic-sauce.jpeg",section:"Sides",price:0.5},{name:"Ranch Sauce",img:"/img/ranch-sauce.jpeg",section:"Sides",price:0.5},{name:"Marinara Sauce",img:"/img/marinara-sauce.jpeg",section:"Sides",price:0.5},{price:2.5,name:'Soda',img:"/img/soda.jpeg",section:'Drinks',choices:['Coke','Coke Zero','Sprite','Root Beer','Fanta','Water']},{price:5,name:'Beer',img:"/img/beer.jpeg",section:'Drinks',choices:['Budweiser','Bud Light','Coors','Coors Light','White Claw','Sierra Nevada IPA','Odouls N/A']}];export var foods=foodItems.reduce(function(res,food){if(!res[food.section]){res[food.section]=[];}res[food.section].push(food);return res;},{});
